Subskills.name: Expanding Heat
Subskills.description: Increases the size of breath of fire.

Subskills.name: Burning Haze
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by breath of fire.

Subskills.name: Hydra's Breeze
Subskills.description: Unleash additional breaths in an arc.

Subskills.name: Heat Combustion
Subskills.description: Chance on hit to unleash burning fragments from the target dealing damage to other nearby targets.

Subskills.name: Double Breeze
Subskills.description: Chance on cast to unleash an additional breath of fire.

Subskills.name: Scorching Exhale
Subskills.description: Increased the length of breath of fire.

Subskills.name: Collateral Ignition
Subskills.description: Chance on hit to spread burning to monsters around the target.

Subskills.name: Molten Orb
Subskills.description: Breath of fire now summons a molten orb traveling forwards breathing fire towards the closest target.

Subskills.name: Burst of Heat
Subskills.description: Chance on hit to unleash a small fire nova if target is burning.

Subskills.name: Breaking Point
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict fire break on burning targets.

Subskills.name: Reverse Hypthermia
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to burning targets.

Subskills.name: Chain of Fire
Subskills.description: Breath of fire now chains multiple times.

Subskills.name: Scorching Hellflame
Subskills.description: Breath of fire now applies stacks of Hellflame which will unleash a fiery pulse of area of effect damage when reaching max stacks.
